Must be connected to the Internet to do this
You can connect your WIFI in "Settings”>WIFI, then enter the password on "Alpha 1"

You can also manually enter the WIFI name and password

Master, you have not posted anything
Use custom commands to create your exclusive robot
Arrange your creations of the past 30 days in order of popularity
Popularity is related to downloads, likes and comments~
If you have any problems, please call the Customer Service Hotline at 400-6666-700
Place the robot on a level surface and connect the adapter to ensure sufficient power
Select the Alpha1 PC programming software. Download and install
Now use the data cable to connect Alpha and your robot
Finally, do not forget to restart the robot to complete the firmware activation
Start the PC software to activate the firmware and play with Alpha
Power down complete,, Please give the robot set action. Click \"finish\" to stop adding
Robot will switch to programming mode, please lay robot at a steady place.
Add actions for robot, start from here
After clicking “Confirm”robot will switch to progarmming mode, please lay robot at a steady place
Adjust joints of robot, set up an action, click \"Add\" when setting up completely
Continue setting up actions, click \"Add\" when setting up completely
Have you mastered the simple programming tutorial? Create new actions now.

In this page, you can create action by switching robot to programming mode. One action is consist of several frames. Make a posture of your robot and add frames into action. Repeat previous steps to complete the action.
Action order cannot be left blank
This action will be pasted over action #.
Switch successfully. Manipulate robot and \'add\' a frame of action here. Click \'end\' to quit.
Considering the large motion range in the preview, you are advised to place the robot on an even surface to prevent falls.

The action name cannot be blank
